nodes.bodyText: Should this be changed back to debug?

NB on backport this needs to restore a previous skip version that looks like this:
 - skip:
      version: " - 6.99.99"
      reason: "The regex length limit was introduced in 7.0.0"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -116,9 +116,6 @@ setup:
 
 ---
 "Regexp length limit":
-  - skip:
-      version: all
-      reason: Long regex breaks HTTP query length when request body is sent as a query param - https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/65718

-      reason: Long regex breaks HTTP query length when request body is sent as a query param - https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/65718
